BIO

I'm fresh graduate, from 6 October University, Egypt with 3 years of work on web development and design. I can learn any skill with web development and Framework in your company in a short time.

• Good knowledge of RESTful APIs.

• Knowledge of hosting models: IIS, SmarterASP.NET.
